content: *chain 5 single_crochet in double_crochet of next ch1-double_crochet-ch1 grp chain 5 single_crochet in center double_crochet of next 3-double_crochet grp repeat from * around ending with chain 3 double_crochet into beg single_crochet round 9 chain 3 work 2 double_crochet in same space single_crochet in next single_crochet *work 5 double_crochet in next space single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around ending with 2 double_crochet in last space where beg of round started join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 fasten_off finishing cut two 14* lengths of ribbon and weave through spaces on round 8 if beads are desired slip one pony bead onto end of each ribbon tail and tie in knot several times to secure bead leaving 1* tail trim end of ribbon diagonally to form point insert bar of soap into bag and tie ribbons in bow as shown in photo finishing for sachet bag 2 cut an 8 square of tulle or net fabric to enclose dried potpourri or perfume-scented cotton balls gather top of net bag and tie securely with cotton thread trimming excess fabric if necessary place potpourri bag inside crocheted bag revised july 2017 -- copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 3
